sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row align="center" class="list px-3 mx-auto">
    <v-col cols="12" md="8">
      <v-text-field v-model="title" label="Procurar por ID"></v-text-field>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="12" md="4">
      <v-btn small @click="searchId">
        Procurar
      </v-btn>
    </v-col>
    <v-col cols="12" sm="12">
      <v-card class="mx-auto" tile>
        <v-card-title>Itens</v-card-title>
        <v-data-table
          :headers="headers"
          :items="itens"
          disable-pagination
          :hide-default-footer="true"
        >
          <template v-slot:[`item.actions`]="{ item }">
            <v-icon small class="mr-2" @click="editItem(item.id)">mdi-pencil</v-icon>
            <v-icon small @click="deleteItem(item.id)">mdi-delete</v-icon>
          </template>
        </v-data-table>
        <v-card-actions v-if="itens.length > 0">
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>
<script>
import ItemDataService from "../services/ItemDataService";
export default {
  name: "item-list",
  data() {
    return {
      itens: [],
      title: "",
      headers: [
        { text: "Codigo", align: "start", sortable: false, value: "codigo" },
        { text: "Descrição", value: "descricao", sortable: false },
        { text: "Status", value: "status", sortable: false },
		{ text: "Disponibilidade", value: "disponibilidade", sortable: false },
		{ text: "Data de movimentação", value: "dataDeMovimentacao" }
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    retrieveItens() {
      ItemDataService.getAll()
        .then((response) => {
          this.itens = response.data.map(this.getDisplayItem);
          console.log(response.data);
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },
    refreshList() {
      this.retrieveTutorials();
    },
    searchId() {
      ItemDataService.findById(this.title)
        .then((response) => {
          this.itens = response.data.map(this.getDisplayItem);
          console.log(response.data);
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },
    editItem(id) {
      this.$router.push({ name: "item-details", params: { id: id } });
    },
    deleteTutorial(id) {
      ItemDataService.delete(id)
        .then(() => {
          this.refreshList();
        })
        .catch((e) => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    },
    getDisplayItem(item) {
      return {
		id: item.id,
        codigo: item.codigo,
        descricao: item.descricao.length > 30 ? item.descricao.substr(0, 30) + "..." : item.descricao,
        localizacao: item.localizacao.length > 30 ? item.localizacao.substr(0, 30) + "..." : item.localizacao,
		status: item.status,
		disponibilidade: item.disponibilidade,
		dataDeMovimentacao: item.dataDeMovimentacao,
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.retrieveItens();
  },
};
</script>
<style>
.list {
  max-width: 750px;
}
</style>
